Straight Shot meets up with Talon in the hallway. She had an idea that she =
would be looking for Tucson.

" Hi, Talon, you must be looking for Tucson. =
I know where he is.  But be ready, he went through a biiig form change.  He=
's a Maximal now.  I bet if you go outside, you'll see him in the sky.  Jus=
t look for a big, silver dragon mech and you've found him." Y'know, maybe w=
e should meet up with him after all.  I'll direct you to his location and p=
rovide ya with ammo."

She transforms into her weapon alt mode, landing in =
Talon's hands.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 7, 20=
11, at 3:42 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:

> Talon=
::
>  
> Talon woke up and started to look after Tucson.
>  
> From: Sandy =
Panico
> Sent: Saturday, August 06, 2011 2:26 PM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om
> Subject: Re: Rise of the Silver Dragon
>  
> 
> 
> Tucson continues Ea=
stward in the direction Rodimus was pointing.  The wind was strong and fast=
 enough to carry him on outstretched wings as he glides swiftly across the =
darkening sky.  Then a faint scent catches his nostrils. 
>  
> " We're in =
the right direction, Rodimus.  I can smell him.  Neither Maximal, Autobot, =
Decepticon or Predacon.  It's far more foul than that.  I believe I've just=
 locked in on our query. "
>  
> A mighty dragon on the hunt, Tucson swiftl=
y flies onward and spots a mech floating in the air, hovering.  Not having =
encountered Saberback, he stops and circles the area around him. 
>  
> " R=
odimus, be ready.  Leo Prime, We're here.  I have the enemy sighted."
>  
>=
 Tucson makes himself heard with a very loud roar.
> 
> Perpetually on the =
move and constantly busy.
> 
> On Aug 6, 2011, at 3:08 PM, Super Cyclonus <=
supercyclonus@...>  wrote:

KSTRIDE>

ds to Leo Prime.

e the first time he
>> > takes actual flight. With a sigh he shows a determ=
ined look as he prepares
>> > to step off the cliff with fully extended win=
gs. He had no idea what to do,
>> > since he was for most of his life, on w=
heels instead of wings.
>> >
>> > " Rodimus, bare with me, this is my first=
 flight. Hold on!"
>> >
>> > He bites the bullet and begins with a strong b=
eat of his wings, as he lifts
>> > his body off the ground. By instinct he =
curls up his front and hind legs as
>> > he gets higher in the air. The hig=
her he gets the more draft he experiences
>> > until he is able to soar on =
outstretched wings without beating them. He
>> > holds his long neck out st=
raight and uses his long tail as a rudder which
>> > keeps him perfectly ba=
lanced in the air. He finds himself speeding past his
>> > comrades which s=
urprises him.
>> >
>> > " Leo Prime wasn't joking, I can't believe I'm capa=
ble of traveling this
>> > fast. All right, I'm gathering intel from the gr=
ound, and I believe we're
>> > on the right flight path. Now let's give our=
 query something that will
>> > cause them to turn their head."
>> >
>> > A=
s he had done at the cave, Tucson releases a strong throated roar which
>> =
> could very well be heard by enemy forces.
>> >
>> > Back at the Ark, Ratt=
rap and Quickstride hears the roar.
>> >
>> > " What the pit was that!?"
>>=
 >

>> >
>> > " That? Oh, Tucson go=
t a major upgrade. Nice voice he's got huh? Oh if ya
>> > see a big silver =
dragon, that's him."
>> >
>> > Rattrap looks up.
>> >
>> > " Wow so he trad=
ed his wheels for wings.. Aww maan now he needs a new
>> > handle!"
>> 
>> =
<NEW - RODIMUS, LEO, WING CALIBER>
>> 
>> As TUSCON flew through the air, h=
is giant wings beating the air
>> RODIMUS was trying to hang on for dear li=
fe! Being a land bound mech
>> he very rarely got a chance to be in the air=
, except for the
>> occasional shuttle ride. At the same time though RODIMU=
S couldn't
>> escape a feeling of exhilaration as the wind tore at him and =
the giant
>> dragon that was now TUSCON moved and turned.
>> 
>> "So where =
are we headed?" RODIMUS said over comlink as he didn't think
>> his voice w=
ould carry well over the sound of the wind whipping past
>> them. "From the=
 reports, the dinosaurs were several hundred miles in
>> that direction." R=
ODIMUS was Pointing in a generally eastward
>> direction.
>> 
>> All around=
 them, as far as the optic could scan there were trees and
>> rolling grass=
es. To the south a desert stretch was forming but it was
>> some distance a=
way. It would take centuries for it to reach the area
>> they were located.=
 There was a string of mountains that ran generally
>> north to south with =
a stong branch running off to the west, places
>> that would one day be cal=
led the Cascade range and the Blue Mountains.
>> 
>> The skies were beginni=
ng to darken as well. Night was beginning to set
>> in, the first stars wer=
e already making their appearance in the dusky
>> skies.
>> 
>> (TAG)
>> 
>=
> Preston
>>

<div>Tucson continu=
es Eastward in the direction Rodimus was pointing.  The 
wind was stro=
ng and fast enough to carry him on outstretched wings as he glides 
swiftly=
 across the darkening sky.  Then a faint scent catches his 
nostrils.&=
nbsp; </div>
<div> </div>
<div>" We're in the right direction, Rodimus=
.  I can smell him.  
Neither Maximal, Autobot, Decepticon or Pre=
dacon.  It's far more foul than 
that.  I believe I've just locke=
d in on our query. " </div>
<div> </div>
<div>A mighty dragon on the h=
unt, Tucson swiftly flies onward and spots a mech 
floating in the air, hov=
ering.  Not having encountered Saberback, he stops 
and circles the ar=
ea around him.  </div>
<div> </div>
<div>" Rodimus, be ready.&nbs=
p; Leo Prime, We're here.  I have the enemy 
sighted."</div>

p;</div>

etually on the 
move and constantly busy. </div>
